name: Animal Rescuer
description:
Animal Rescuer is helping lovely animals through exploring an epic world with faster gameplay and increased quest and combat intensity.
Engage in a great roleplaying experience – achieve quests and complete objectives of the entire storyAcquire plants to prepare medicine for lovely animals needing helpMeet new people along the way through fantastic cities and villages of this worldDemonstrate warrior abilities in epic combats with enemies and bosses
